description: Sheffield United release new away strip
title: Sheffield United release new away strip
title_page: Sheffield United release new away strip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Sheffield United have delved into history as inspiration for their 2023-24 away strip.
They say this season's new yellow shirt harks back to the 1980s and early 1990s when Blades moved from division four to the top flight of English football.
It will be worn for the first time when United travel to Nottingham Forest on Friday, 18 August.
